channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 02:39 Air anxiety in Sumy Oblast follow the following messages.
item.description: 游댮 02:39 Air anxiety in Sumy Oblast follow the following messages.#Sumy_oblast This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lauda territorial community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv_.
